dcterms:creator: B. Bamieh
F. Paganini
M. A. Dahleh
dcterms:description: A dataset used for analyzing distributed control of spatially invariant systems, providing insights into the optimal estimation problem in such systems.
dcterms:title: Kalman Filter for Spatially Invariant Systems

dcterms:creator: J. Arbelaiz
B. Bamieh
A. E. Hosoi
A. Jadbabaie
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on distributed Kalman filtering for spatially-invariant diffusion processes, examining the impact of noise on communication requirements.
dcterms:title: Distributed Kalman Filtering for Spatially-Invariant Diffusion Processes

dcterms:creator: J. Arbelaiz
E. Jensen
B. Bamieh
A. E. Hosoi
A. Jadbabaie
L. Lessard
dcterms:description: This dataset provides information structures of the Kalman filter specifically for the elastic wave equation, contributing to the understanding of filtering in elastic wave dynamics.
dcterms:title: Information Structures of the Kalman Filter for Elastic Wave Dynamics

dcterms:creator: J. Arbelaiz
B. Bamieh
A. E. Hosoi
A. Jadbabaie
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on optimal structured controllers for spatially invariant systems, providing a convex reformulation for better control strategies.
dcterms:title: Optimal Structured Controllers for Spatially Invariant Systems
